attributes.action: Examine planning law to ensure that inappropriate applications such as Greenhithe Marina are required to have at least basic amenities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some planning applications such as the proposed Greenhithe Marina are introduced for consideration without basic amenities, such as decent access roads and minimal parking areas.  There should be a code of practice to ensure that basic standards are required as a minimum.
